DOC.detailed_description: Daikenchuto ( TJ-100 ) , traditional Japanese herbal medicine , use prevention treatment postoperative ileus . TJ-100 extract powder ( Tsumura & Co. , Tokyo , Japan ) manufacture aqueous extract contain 2.2 % Japanese pepper , 5.6 % process ginger , 3.3 % ginseng , 88.9 % maltose syrup powder . A recent randomize , parallel-group , double-blind , placebo-controlled , dose-response trial demonstrate TJ-100 accelerates colonic transit time , particularly ascend colon . Given potential action intestinal tract , seem reasonable postulate TJ-100 may play role improve prevent bowel dysmotility . This study design investigate effect TJ-100 intestinal dysmotility prevention postoperative paralytic ileus patient undergo pancreaticoduodenectomy . The primary endpoint incidence postoperative paralytic ileus . Secondary endpoint QOL assessment Gastrointestinal Symptom Rating Scale ( GSRS ) Score ( Japanese Version ) visual analogue scale , change ratio abdominal circumference , incidence postoperative complication , length hospital day , incidence surgical site infection . Two hundred patient require study ( 100 patient per group ) .
